item.title: Dumped Office Chair near bus stop BS, 1st February
item.description:
Location, traffic flow towards Bromley near Bus stop BS. Just past bus stop a large office chair, black with red piping has been dumped on the verge. Stand with your back to the road, a few yards further on from shelter it is on the L/H side of bus shelter on the verge in front of some shrubs. Can you please take away. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A21, Bromley Common, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping next to bins on rhodes house estate, 1st February
item.description:
Made a report a couple days ago and someone has yet again left more junk. Treating the place like a dump. Can signs or cameras be put up to stop this please?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Provost Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter build up, 1st February
item.description:
Since the cleaners shed has moved from Richmount gardens the litter never seems to get picked up. The flats on casterbridge seem to get attention but Richmount grds has seen no litter pick at all. It is building up. Can the estate cleaners please make an appearance??

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Richmount Gardens, Blackheath
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fordwych Road, 1st February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fordwych Road, Kilburn, Greater London
